alert.note: Alert for Dearborn (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:31AM EDT until April 01 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...In Southeast Indiana, Dearborn, Ohio and Ripley Counties. * WHEN...Until 300 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 930 AM EDT, emergency management reported flooding along State Route 62. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Versailles, French, Hartford, Friendship, Olean and Versailles Lake.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
